title: LAGGG
body: Lag is annoying. I have the worst internet. Literally. EVERY game I lag. My leaver buster is a sad 20 minutes for 5 rounds. It's not getting any better. Can someone please give me any recommendations/help besides switching my internet? Thanks :D

replies.body: If you're having connection problems, besides switching to an ethernet cord your only options are mostly going to be related to adjusting certain network settings. Without knowing too much about what's going wrong, there are several different options which might help. Make sure you cover your bases by checking the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but also make sure you test out an ethernet cable as well!
